Package Amazon

Classes
AmazonAdsThis class makes use of the Amazon API by CodeDiesel, (see http://www.codediesel.com/php/accessing-amazon-product-advertising-api-in-php/), including additions done to it by Izzy.
AmazonProductAPIClass to access Amazons Product Advertising API. Not all possible search/lookup requests are implemented here. You can easily implement the others from the ones given below.

Functions
aws_signed_requestAccess the Amazon API and obtain data
